name: GeodesicActiveContourLevelSet
doc: Level Set filter that uses propagation, curvature and advection terms.

members.name: MaximumRMSError
members.doc: Value of RMS change below which the filter should stop. This is a convergence criterion.

members.name: PropagationScaling
members.doc: Weight of direct propagation contribution to the speed term

members.name: CurvatureScaling
members.doc: Weight of the curvature contribution to the speed term

members.name: AdvectionScaling
members.doc: Weight of the advection contribution to the speed term
